description: Date ranges for bulk PO downloads from Nevada ePro
notes: Nevada ePro has a 50,000 record CSV export limit
These ranges are designed to stay under that limit
Ranges may overlap to ensure no POs are missed

update_strategy_options.all: Download all ranges to ensure complete data coverage
update_strategy_options.last: Download only the last range for recent updates
update_strategy_options.incremental: Download only ranges that haven't been successfully downloaded today

ranges.description: Historical data from system start through mid-2023
Recent data from mid-2023 through future dates

future_ranges.comment: Add new ranges here as data grows
